saao/saa15/P334116
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}{d}AG-EN-GIN lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia₂ ṭe₃-e-mu ša {KUR}NIM.MA{KI}-a.a ša a-na LUGAL aš₂-pur-an-ni x x x x x x x-ti x x x x x x x-nu x x x x x {1}{d}AG-BA-ša₂ x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x-ka x x x x x x x ma x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x-nu x x x x x x x-ka x x x x x x x x x x x x x x ha-ra-me-ma x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x x x x-ie-e ša LUGAL {KUR}NIM.MA{KI} a-šap-pa-ra o an-nu-rig e-gir₂-tu₂ o ša {1}na-ṣi-bi ša ina UGU o {1}{d}AG-BA-ša₂ tal-lik-an-ni ina IGI LUGAL EN-ia₂ u₂-se-bi-la-ši a-na-ku TA@v {1}DINGIR-ia-da-aʾ a-du {URU}me-tur-na at-ta-lak UN-MEŠ am-mu-ti u₂-se-ti-iq a-su-uh-ra UD 09-KAM₂ {1}ba-la-ṭi-i ina {URU}BAD₃-EN-DINGIR-a.a ina ir-ti-ia₂ an-nu-rig E₂ LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni-i-ni al-lak a-sa-par {LU₂}ERIM-MAN-e-a {LU₂}ERIM-MAN-e-a ut-tu-ku gab-ri e-gir₂-ti an-ni-ti ša {1}na-ṣi-bi ar₂-hiš liš-pa-ru-u-ni ina UGU {1}{d}AG-BA-ša₂ la-aš₂-pur
